name: All-Goblin (Pre-Release)
description:
Pre Release For the All Goblin Project

This is a work in progress and is for testing and feedback for anyone who is interested in the idea behind this game.

You are a goblin, an alien species recently brought to the brink of extinction. You must find your way out of the temple, turned prison, by any means necessary.

Find strange creatures, obscure and hidden secrets. Or just beat the game in like 20 minutes. The choice is yours and it's All Goblin.

Many goblins were harmed in the making of this game, don't let their sacrifice be in vain.

The full game will be released here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2346470/All_Goblin/?curator_clanid=4777282&ut...
